item.title: Installing Terraform and Creating an EC2 Instance
item.description: Ensure the prerequisites An AWS Account AWS cli installed, instructions for the same can be found here. Have generated credentials (access key and secret), can be created from here. Setting up AWS CLI Type aws configure on the terminal and enter the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key, other fields can be blank. Creating a config file for terraform to understand Create a directory and switch to it Create a file named main.
